meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>still</kanji> need more time to finish a project and you tell whoever is in charge <kanji>beforehand</kanji> you'll be able to get an <vocabulary>extension</vocabulary>. Then you'll be able to finish it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
